entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Thursday 13 April 2023
